title: 2 Quick Ways to Find Someone on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp app.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp app. This looks like a white speech bubble and phone receiver on a green background. If you're not automatically logged in, follow the instructions to register your phone number.

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . It's near the top of the screen. This will open the Chats page. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the "Back" button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap the "New Chat" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "New Chat" icon. It's the round, green, speech bubble-shaped icon in the lower-right corner of the screen. This will bring up a list of contacts. All of your contacts who are on WhatsApp will be listed on the contacts page.

steps.title: Tap New contact.
steps.content: Tap New contact . It's at the top of your Contacts menu next to an icon that resembles a person. Doing so will take you to the new contact creation page.

steps.title: Tap the Search icon.
steps.content: Tap the Search icon. This is the magnifying glass icon.

steps.title: Enter a phone number in the field.
steps.content: Enter a phone number in the field. If the phone number is registered with WhatsApp, you can tap Chat to begin chatting. [1] X Research source If the phone number is not registered with WhatsApp, you can tap Share invite link to invite the phone number's owner to chat on WhatsApp.

steps.title: Add the contact
steps.content: Add the contact . Tap New Contact , and then fill in their details. When you're finished, tap Save . [2] X Research source You can now chat, make a voice call, or make a video call with the new contact.

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp app.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp app. This looks like a white speech bubble and phone receiver on a green background. If you're not automatically logged in, follow the instructions to register your phone number. On iOS devices, you cannot use WhatsApp to search for a contact whose phone number is not already in your contacts. Be sure to add new contacts to your device before using WhatsApp .

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . It's the speech bubble-shaped icon at the bottom of the screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the "Back" button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap the "New Chat" button.
steps.content: Tap the "New Chat" button. It's the square, blue icon with a pencil in it in the upper-right corner of the screen. This will open the Contacts page. You'll see every contact who uses WhatsApp listed on this page.

steps.title: Search for a contact.
steps.content: Search for a contact. Scroll down the list of people on this page until you find the contact. You can also type a contact's name in the search field at the top of the screen. If a contact is not on WhatsApp, you can invite them to use WhatsApp. Scroll to the bottom of the list and tap Invite Friends to WhatsApp Select how you'd like to send the invitation. Tap the contacts you'd like to invite. Tap Done at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Select a contact.
steps.content: Select a contact. This will open a chat with them, allowing you to initiate a conversation.
